# vite-plugin-generate-routes

auto watch page's change and generate routes

github (opens new window)

# use

/** vite.config.js */
import pluginRoutes from 'vite-plugin-generate-routes'
export default defineConfig({
  plugins: [
    pluginRoutes()
  ]
  ...
}

# nuxt rules

pages：
--| page1.vue
--| page2
----| index.vue
----| page21.vue
----| _id.vue
--| page3
----| page31.vue
----| #componentName.vue

=>

routes：
--| page1
--| page2
--| page2/page21
--| page2/:id
--| page31
  • start with '_' means dynamic component：page/_id.vue => /page/:id
  • start with '#' means ignore

# config

# dir

  • Type: string
  • Default: src/views

# extend

  • Type: Function
export default defineConfig({
  plugins: [
    pluginRoutes({
      extend: (route) => {
        if(route.path === '/') {
          route = {
            title: 'root'
            meta: {
              auth: false
            },
            ...route
          }
        }
      }
    })
  ]
  ...
}
